name: Drenchen Clan
description: You can breathe underwater, and tests related to the swamps are improved.

name: Healing Touch
description: Once a day, heal with a touch, rather than during rest (page 31). Vliyaya.

name: Ambush Hunter
description: Double any damage dealt against unwary foes.

name: Finwings
description: You can swim as fast as a Landstrider can run, which is pretty fast.

name: Dousan Clan
description: You can always find water, and tests related to the desert are improved.

name: Accept Death
description: When damaged, add +1 to your Fighting rolls.

name: Trance
description: Once a day you can commune with Thra, gaining insight into the history of an item.

name: Dream-etched Tattoos
description: You are protected from Vliyaya effects; rolls to resist them are improved.

name: Grottan Clan
description: You can see perfectly in the dark, and tests related to caves are improved.

name: Finger-Talk
description: You can tap on hard surfaces to send messages to anyone touching that surface.

name: Alchemy
description: During a rest you can make herbs into potions to double their duration or effect.

name: Shrouding
description: You can extinguish the light from one light source within a short distance. Vliyaya.

name: Sifa Clan
description: You can foretell tomorrow's weather, and tests related to seafaring are improved.

name: Prophetic Warning
description: Once per day allow a Gelfling to reroll a die they just rolled. Vliyaya.

name: Signs and Symbols
description: Tests to decipher ancient writing are improved.

name: Sailor
description: Travel by boat for you and your allies is free, as you make yourself useful.

name: Spriton Clan
description: You can speak the Podling tongue, and tests related to plains are improved.

name: Animal Tongue
description: You can make yourself understood by the animals of Thra. Vliyaya.

name: Greenfingers
description: After harvesting an herb, it gains +1 uses.

name: Careful Packing
description: You can carry one extra piece of gear (heavy or not) without any penalty.

name: Stonewood Clan
description: You start with a simple weapon (page 257), and tests related to forests are improved.

name: Living Weapons
description: Unarmed Fighting tests are not hindered.

name: Unparalleled fighter
description: When you draw in a fighting challenge, deal one damage to your enemy.

name: Fated Warrior
description: By concentrating for a minute, you sense any legendary gear nearby. Vliyaya.

name: Vapra Clan
description: Tests related to Skeksis or mountains are improved.

name: Wealth
description: Gain three gems. These have no use, but are highly prized by Gelfling traders.

name: Metalworking
description: You can improve a metal item once per item, giving it +1 durability.

name: Skilled Flyer
description: You fly higher and faster than others; tests related to flying are improved.
